3.13.0.0.message: Enabled at-rest keyring encryption for sensitive fields in AI AWS Guardrails plugin.
Added block reason info metrics to AWS Guardrails plugin analytics.

added the flag `ssl_verify` to control
certificate verification when connecting to the bedrock service.
Fixed an issue where the error does not reflect the root cause when the `guardrails_version` did not match the expected pattern.
Fixed an issue where the ai-aws-guardrails metrics could not be recorded.

3.12.0.0.message: Add support for AWS IAM role to the ai-aws-guardrails plugin.
Fixed the plugin to work with multi-modal content.

3.12.0.1.message: Fixed an issue where the ai-aws-guardrails metrics could not be recorded.

3.11.0.0.message: Added a new AI plugin that can protect requests and responses to/from AI LLM.
Fixed an issue where the plugin did not support inspecting responses in non-stream mode.

3.11.0.3.message: Fixed the plugin to work with multi-modal content.

3.11.0.7.message: Fixed an issue where the ai-aws-guardrails metrics could not be recorded.
